# dbProject

The goal of dbProject is to manage dbData objects and database
connections in the dbverse ecosystem.

## Installation

You can install the development version of dbProject like so:

``` r
pak::pak("dbverse-org/dbproject-r")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(dbProject)
## TODO
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`dbReconnect()`](https://dbverse-org.github.io/dbproject-r/reference/dbReconnect.md)
  : Reconnect database connection for dbData objects
- [`read_pin_conn(`*`<conn_spatial_table>`*`)`](https://dbverse-org.github.io/dbproject-r/reference/read_pin_conn.conn_spatial_table.md)
  : Read a pinned dbSpatial object from a pins board
- [`write_pin_conn(`*`<dbSpatial>`*`)`](https://dbverse-org.github.io/dbproject-r/reference/write_pin_conn.dbSpatial.md)
  : Write a dbSpatial object to a pins board
